title: Trump Launches Model Management Agency with Systematic Visa Violations
summary: Donald Trump founds Trump Model Management (originally T Models), which would bring approximately 250 international models to the United States. Investigative reporting later revealed systematic H-1B visa fraud, with models instructed to lie to customs officials and work illegally on tourist visas. Models were charged $1,200-1,600 per month for bunk beds in overcrowded apartments while working without proper authorization.

sources.title: Donald Trump's modeling agency broke immigration laws, attorneys say
Former Models for Donald Trump's Agency Say They Violated Immigration Rules
